trans-unit.source: Provides the base functionality for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StaticPartialCachingControl"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: 提供的基本功能<xref href="System.Web.UI.StaticPartialCachingControl"></xref>和<xref href="System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The BasePartialCachingControl class represents a user control that has output caching enabled in programmatic scenarios.
trans-unit.target: BasePartialCachingControl 類別表示有程式設計案例中啟用輸出快取的使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides several ways to enable output caching for a control.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供了數種方式啟用輸出快取控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following list describes methods you can use to enable output caching: - Use the `@ OutputCache` directive to enable output caching in declarative scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 下列清單描述您可用來啟用輸出快取的方法:-使用`@ OutputCache`指示詞，以啟用輸出快取中宣告的案例。

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingAttribute> class to enable caching for a user control in a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: -使用<xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingAttribute>類別，讓使用者控制項程式碼後置檔案中的快取。</xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingAttribute>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> class to specify cache settings in programmatic scenarios in which you are working with BasePartialCachingControl instances.
trans-unit.target: -使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>類別，以指定您正在 BasePartialCachingControl 執行個體的程式設計案例中的快取設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy"></xref> object that is associated with the wrapped user control.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy"></xref>包裝的使用者控制項相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: The CachePolicy property enables programmatic access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> object associated with the user control contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl> instance.
trans-unit.target: CachePolicy 屬性可讓您以程式設計方式存取<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>物件所包含的使用者控制項相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl>執行個體。</xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> object can be programmatically manipulated to influence a user control's caching behavior and settings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>物件可以用程式設計方式操作來影響使用者控制項的快取行為和設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy"></xref> that stores output caching-related properties of the wrapped user control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy"> </xref>會儲存已包裝的使用者控制項的輸出快取相關屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency"></xref> class associated with the cached user control output.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency"></xref>快取的使用者控制輸出相關聯的類別。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to remove user control output from the output cache when the associated cache dependency changes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您從輸出快取中移除使用者控制輸出相關聯的快取相依性變更時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency"></xref> associated with the server control.
Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Outputs the user control's content to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> output stream.
trans-unit.target: 將使用者控制項的內容到指定的輸出<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that writes the cached control to the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>頁面寫入快取的控制項。
